attributes.action: make a fair car tax policy
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Perhaps a fairer way to do car tax would to be tax the cyclist who have had all these nice cycle lanes put in. Also other road users who do not pay any tax ie tractors, caravans & horse riders

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
